message: You are absolutely right! Satoshi Nakamoto first introduced their white paper back in 2008, aiming to create a trustless and decentralized system built on blockchain technology. Since then, the blockchain ecosystem has grown exponentially, with thousands of tokens available and complex ecosystems with varying organizational structures. This has created a wide range of possibilities for users to explore and take advantage of. What do you find most interesting or exciting about the blockchain ecosystem?
speaker: BOSWORTH
